Homeric Group
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ezekiel, Moses Jacob (American sculptor, 1844-1917) [sculptor]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: casting (process) (figure) ; bronze (metal) (figure); black marble (upper base); stone (rock) (lower base) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ezekiel completed the statue in 1907 on a commission from John Woodruff Simpson as a gift for Amherst College, his alma mater. For reasons unknown the gift was refused, and Thomas Nelson Page, a Virginia alumnus who was active in the UVA Alumni Association, stepped in to secure the gift of the statue to UVa instead. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homer_(Ezekiel) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
